trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> class represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> objects.
<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> implements the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> interface.
This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated.
It is a read-only class accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref> method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection to an array.
An <xref href="System.Array"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
The zero-based index in array where the collection is copied.
One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo[],System.Int32)"></xref> method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection to a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> array.

An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> objects where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
The zero-based index in array where the collection is copied.
One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection.Count"></xref> property retrieves the number of items in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
An int value that represents the number of items in the collection.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection.GetEnumerator"></xref> method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection.IsSynchronized"></xref> property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
This property always returns `false`, which means the collection is not thread safe.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value of `false`, which means the collection is not thread safe.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection.Item(System.Int32)"></xref> property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
An int value that represents the index in the collection.
The index is zero based.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object at the specified index.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection.SyncRoot"></xref> property retrieves an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator"></xref> method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
